sentences.en: ‘I don’t see why I should take the blame for this!’ she protested.
sentences.cn: “我不明白为什么我要对此承担责任！”她抗议道。

sentences.en: ‘I'm only here under protest,’ Jenna said shortly.
sentences.cn: “我是被迫来的，”詹纳不耐烦地说。

sentences.en: Against the belief in such abrupt changes, embryology enters a strong protest.
sentences.cn: 对于这种突然变化的信念, 在胚胎学上提出了强有力的反证.

sentences.en: Alberg opened his mouth, as if to protest. But he thought better of it.
sentences.cn: 阿尔伯格张了张嘴，似乎想要申辩，但想想又放弃了。

sentences.en: Bethune started to protest but the General waved him to be silent.
sentences.cn: 白求恩刚要开口辩驳,就给将军摆摆手止住了.

sentences.en: Five thousand employees came out on strike in protest at the poor working conditions.
sentences.cn: 五千名雇员公开罢工，抗议恶劣的工作条件。

sentences.en: General Wavell only obeyed under protest.
sentences.cn: 韦维尔将军虽然遵从命令,但是心实不满.

sentences.en: He picked up the cat before Rosa could protest.
sentences.cn: 未等罗莎表示异议，他就抱起了猫。

sentences.en: He started to say something in protest, then changed his mind.
sentences.cn: 他开始想说些申辩的话, 后来改变了主意.

sentences.en: Is the protest an official statement of the cause of the loss of the goods?
sentences.cn: 海事报告是对造成货物损失的正式表明 吗 ?

sentences.en: My mother did not suffer her authority to pass from her without a shadow of protest.
sentences.cn: 我母亲并不是连一丝一毫都没反抗,就让她的大权旁落的.

sentences.en: She paid the fine under protest.
sentences.cn: 她争执一番后,无可奈何地缴纳了罚金.

sentences.en: The pale green dome making the aesthetic protest in the solitude of sky.
sentences.cn: 淡绿色的圆顶在寂寞的天空中孤芳自赏.

sentences.en: This proposition was greeted with an immediate outcry of protest from Chang Su - su and Wu Chih - sheng.
sentences.cn: 他这话刚出口,立刻就引起了 张素素 与吴芝生两个人的大叫.

sentences.en: Thousands of people blocked the street, protesting against the new legislation.
sentences.cn: 成千上万的人堵住了街道，抗议新法规。

sentences.en: We cannot pass this matter by without protest.
sentences.cn: 我们不能对此事听之任之.

sentences.en: We protest this vile abjection of youth to age.
sentences.cn: 我们反对年轻人如此卑劣地苛待老年人.

sentences.en: When we tried to protest that Mo was beaten up they didn't believe us.
sentences.cn: 我们试图申明莫遭到了毒打，他们却不相信我们。

sentences.en: Who prepares a statement known as the protest?
sentences.cn: 谁来写海事报告 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 抗议者；反对者；持异议者

phrases.tran_cn: 心甘情愿地；不反对地；[经]在“不保留异议”的情况下

trans.tran_cn: 抗议，反对，抗议书（或行动）
trans.tran_en: something that you do to show publicly that you think that something is wrong and unfair, for example taking part in big public meetings, refusing to work, or refusing to buy a company’s products

trans.tran_cn: （公开）反对，抗议， 坚决地表示，申辩
trans.tran_en: to come together to publicly express disapproval or opposition to something
something that you do to show publicly that you think that something is wrong and unfair, for example taking part in big public meetings, refusing to work, or refusing to buy a company’s products
